SIRIS | Research for Investing in a Sustainable Future  The Sustainable Investment Research Institute (SIRIS) is a dedicated, specialised ESG research group, providing investment research and analysis of corporate sustainability and governance risks and opportunities. Our research primarily focuses on the Asia-Pacific region with a team that includes multilingual Asian-language speaking analysts that holds extensive knowledge on local sustainability and governance practices.
